title: Valid Palindrome
description: Given a string s, determine if it is a palindrome, considering only alphanumeric characters and ignoring cases.
editorial: Use two pointers and skip non-alphanumeric characters.

testcases.input: A man, a plan, a canal: Panama

title: Valid Palindrome II
description: Return true if the string can be a palindrome after deleting at most one character.
editorial: On mismatch, skip either left or right once.

title: Reverse Vowels of a String
description: Reverse only the vowels in a string.
editorial: Use two pointers to swap vowels.

title: Remove Vowels from a String
description: Remove all vowels from the given string.

title: Is Subsequence
description: Check if string s is a subsequence of string t.

title: Check if Sentence Is Pangram
description: Check whether the sentence contains all letters of the English alphabet.
editorial: Use a set to track unique characters.

title: Detect Capital
description: Check whether capitalization is used correctly in a word.

title: First Unique Character in a String
description: Find the index of the first non-repeating character.

title: Longest Common Prefix
description: Find the longest common prefix among an array of strings.
